an7.79:4.1: “Sattahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato vinayadharo sobhati.
an7.79:4.3: Āpattiṃ jānāti, anāpattiṃ jānāti, lahukaṃ āpattiṃ jānāti, garukaṃ āpattiṃ jānāti, sīlavā hoti … pe …
an7.79:4.4: samādāya sikkhati sikkhāpadesu, catunnaṃ jhānānaṃ ābhicetasikānaṃ nikāmalābhī hoti akicchalābhī akasiralābhī, āsavānaṃ khayā … pe …
an7.79:4.6: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, sattahi dhammehi samannāgato vinayadharo sobhatī”ti.
